column4: <title>The British Academy joins with Dare to recognise the ones to watch</title>
<description>The top young video games talent in the UK is to be recognised with a new BAFTA- endorsed award announced today</description>
<title>The Emergence of Artificial Culture in Robot Societies</title>
<description>Scientists at Abertay University are part of a UK consortium looking at how 'artificial culture' emerges within a group of robots</description>
<description>Around 90 pupils from across Scotland will assemble at the University of Abertay Dundee on Friday 20th April to take part in the Scottish Final of the CREST awards</description>
